mention.text: Allen said. ; As Allen recalls it , the late-night incident began with the three men speeding down the Foothill Freeway in northern Los Angeles at what might have been as fast as 80 mph
the three men in the car
the one who had her hand out saying I did n't do anything wrong
the one that had his hands up
Three blacks in a car , all white policemen
the Foothill Freeway in northern Los Angeles
